strategy: Space Marine armies have a Strategy Rating of 5.
Initiative: All formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+.
armyRules: The They Shall Know No Fear and Cult of the Machine special rules applies to all Iron Hands detachments and aircraft formations.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Iron Hands, or one of their successor chapters, using their preferred operational methods.

formations.name: Dreadnought Clan
formations.units: Four Tacticals plus transport, and any two of the following: Dreadnought, Hellfire Dreadnought, Siege Dreadnought

formations.name: Mechanized Clan
formations.units: Four Tacticals plus transport, and any two of the following: Predator Annihilator, Predator Destructor or Vindicator*
formations.notes: * If only Vindicators are selected, any Rhinos in the formation may be upgraded to Siege Rhinos for free. The Veteran Sergeant must be placed in an infantry unit

sections.name: Iron Hands Support Detachments
sections.description: Two Support Detachments may be taken per Core Detachment

formations.name: Dreadnought Talon
formations.units: Any four of the following: Dreadnought, Hellfire Dreadnought, Siege Dreadnought

formations.name: Predator
formations.units: Any four of the following: Predator Annihilator, Predator Destructor

formations.name: Siege Scouts
formations.units: Four Scouts, two Siege Rhinos and two Vindicators

formations.name: Whirlwinds
extraUnits: Add one Whirlwind to the formation: 75 points

sections.name: Iron Hands Aircraft & Imperial Allies
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

formations.name: Warhound Pack
formations.units: Two Warhounds - Standard or Support Configuration
extraUnits: Upgrade both Warhounds to the Tank Hunter Configuration: 50 points

upgrades.title: Iron Hands Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per detachment

options.description: Choose one of the following:
Add one Hunter to the formation
Add two Hunters to the formation
Add up to two Stalkers to the formation

items.name: Battle Barge
items.description: Replace the Strike Cruiser with a Battle Barge

options.description: Choose one of the following options:
Add an Iron Captain or Iron Hands Techmarine to any infantry unit in the formation
Replace one Dreadnought with a Venerable Dreadnought
Add one Venerable Dreadnought
0-1 per army:
Replace one Dreadnought with a Venerable Dreadnought with the Supreme Commander special ability
Add one Iron Hands Supreme Commander to any infantry unit in the formation

items.name: Devastators
items.description: Replace all Tacticals in the formation with Devastators

options.description: Choose up to two of the following:
Replace a Dreadnought with an Ironclad Dreadnought
Add one Dreadnought, Hellfire Dreadnought or Siege Dreadnought
Add one Ironclad Dreadnought

items.name: Drop Pods
items.description: The formation may be deployed in a Drop Pod

items.name: Helios
items.description: Upgrade any number of Land Raiders to Land Raider Helios

items.name: Transports
items.description: Add any number of Razorbacks or Land Raider variants, up to the number required to transport the formation

options.description: Land Raider
Land Raider Anvilarum
Land Raider Helios
0-1 Land Raider Prometheus
Razorback

items.name: Venerable Dreadnought
items.description: Replace one Dreadnought with a Venerable Dreadnought
